name: Couponfan
tag_list: coupons, coupon-codes, savings, shopping, affiliate, discount-codes
overview:
Free on-line coupon code provider.

The purpose of the site and goals are to provide coupon codes and deal links for the most popular online stores on the web. We have focused our attention to make an extremely well designed, clean, and clutter free user friendly website that is easy on the eyes and extremely simple to use.

We have designed a fully functional Google-like search bar to browse stores via site name, URL and keywords which are accessed with pull down menus. We only include active working coupons, so that users don’t waste time and energy attempting to use multiple stale and expired coupons. We have also included a huge inventory of video tutorials which no other coupon site provides, to help guide users on how to retrieve and apply coupon codes for specific stores. We have even given the users the ability to share coupons with their friends and family via e-mail, twitter and facebook, all with the click of a button!

On our site, support and contact forms are available in case you need to reach support in the event that a coupon or store link is missing. In that case, we would gladly investigate, retrieve and post up the missing coupons to help your online shopping needs. On top of all the benefits of the site, we don’t collect a dime. It also doesn’t sell advertisements to anyone. Couponfan is ad and cost free!
